LanguageData.HVP_RemovedHediff: Word of Sterility removed the {0} condition from {1}!
LanguageData.HVP_NoParalysisText: Destroys all paralysis links being maintained by this caster.
LanguageData.HVP_RecallText: Teleports {PAWN_nameDef} to the linked tether skipgate.
LanguageData.HVP_RecallTextFantasy: Teleports {PAWN_nameDef} to the linked tether portal.
LanguageData.HVP_NoPsyphonText: Destroys all psyphon links being maintained by this caster.
LanguageData.HVP_NoBoosterText: Destroys all booster links being maintained by this caster.
LanguageData.HVP_StorageDumpText: Skips all items stored by vault Skip to the caster's location.
LanguageData.HVP_UndoRJText: Ends the effects of the rejuvenation skip on {PAWN_nameDef}.
LanguageData.HVP_UndoRJTextFantasy: Ends the effects of the rejuvenation spell on {PAWN_nameDef}.
LanguageData.HVP_EvictionSkipCosts: Psyfocus cost per pawn body size or building footprint size
LanguageData.HVP_EvictionSkipCostsF: Mana cost per pawn body size or building footprint size
LanguageData.HVP_NoTransferrableEnergy: has no need for sleep or energy
LanguageData.HVP_NoLowerSkills: donor has no better-level skills than recipient
LanguageData.HVP_TargetAlreadyTethered: target is already affected by tether skip
LanguageData.HVP_NotGoodDropSpot: aerial drops cannot land at the target location
LanguageData.HVP_RoofedLightning: lightning cannot strike under a roof
LanguageData.HVP_WrongItemType: target must be a chunk, resource, or raw food item
LanguageData.HVP_HiveBlocked: insufficient room for a hive there
LanguageData.HVP_HiveTooCold: too cold for hives to spawn there
LanguageData.HVP_WhereYouGonnaPutThatRoofEh: target space cannot support a roof
LanguageData.HVP_YoureUnderground: can't be used in an underground map
LanguageData.HVP_CommandPsycastNotEnoughPsyfocusForSi: {PSYCASTNAME} needs {0} psyfocus to evict the target but {CASTERNAME} only has {1} psyfocus.
{PSYCASTNAME} needs {0} mana to evict the target but {CASTERNAME} only has {1} mana.
LanguageData.HVP_DropPodDefault: The summoned drop pod depressurized during atmospheric entry, rendering its contents to ash.
LanguageData.HVP_PsyphonBroken: The psyphon link established by {0} was broken by {1}, stunning both of them.
LanguageData.HVP_VaultDeath: Due to the death of {PAWN_nameDef}, everything {PAWN_pronoun} was carrying in {PAWN_possessive} vault skip was ejected.
LanguageData.HVP_VaultDeathNoWarranty: Some items have been irretrievably lost.
LanguageData.HVP_PsychicKidnapping: A psycaster belonging to the {0} faction used Word of Safety to kidnap {1}.
LanguageData.HVP_SettingPSM: Amount of psytrainers sold by traders
LanguageData.HVP_TooltipPsytrainerSaleMulti: Scales the amount of psytrainers traders will sell; at 2x, a trader who would ordinarily sell 1-3 psytrainers will sell 2-6. This won't cause traders who don't sell psytrainers to start doing so.
LanguageData.HVP_TooltipSettingPLPL: Whenever a pawn gains a psylink level, they will gain this many psycasts (1 is normal). This will not apply retroactively.
LanguageData.HVP_TooltipBuffFlashstorm: Dramatically increases the number of lightning strikes caused by the Flashstorm psycast, and causes some of them to have increased damage and armor penetration. Does not affect natural flashstorms. Does not retroactively apply to Flashstorms that have already been cast.
